text: Our son absolutely loves going to BRMCLL Vanda. He and has matured and learnt so much from school. The teachers are warm, attentive and we receive regular updates on what he does in school. He has improved in his overall learning and holistic development and also his independence. We love this school and the teachers! Highly recommend this school to all!
Good to see the school pivot from just academic development and excellence to promote good psychosocial and mental health among its students
The school is poorly run and needs a change of principal.
